MODEL_IN_USE.messagePattern: Model `<%= model %>` id `<%= id %>` is in use.

MODIFY_OWN_RECORD.messagePattern: Model `<%= model %>` id `<%= id %>` is used by current logged in user. Cannot modify own record.

DELETE_OWN_RECORD.messagePattern: Model `<%= model %>` id `<%= id %>` is used by current logged in user. Cannot delete own record.

DELETE_LAST_USER.messagePattern: Cannot delete the last user of the system. The system must have at least one user.

DELETE_ACTIVE_OUTBREAK.messagePattern: The outbreak (id: `<%= id %>`) is active for at least another user. Cannot delete an active outbreak.

ONE_ACTIVE_OUTBREAK.messagePattern: There is already an active outbreak (id: `<%= id %>`) in the system.

FUNCTIONALITY_NOT_IMPLEMENTED.messagePattern: The requested functionality is not implemented.

MODEL_NOT_FOUND_IN_CONTEXT.messagePattern: Unknown `<%= model %>` id `<%= id %>` in context of `<%= contextModel %>` id `<%= contextId %>`

MODEL_CONFLICT.messagePattern: Model with id `<%= id %>` already exists

VALIDATION_ERROR.messagePattern: The `<%= model %>` instance is not valid. Details: <%= details %>

MISSING_REQUIRED_PERMISSION.messagePattern: Logged in user must have (at least) one of the following permissions to access this endpoint: <%= permissions %>.

INVALID_PASSWORD.messagePattern: The password must be at least <%= length %> characters in length and it must contain at least 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter, 1 digit and 1 special character.

PASSWORD_RECOVERY_FAILED.messagePattern: Information provided is incorrect. Details: <%= details %>

INVALID_SECURITY_QUESTIONS.messagePattern: Security questions must be different and answers can not be empty.

ACCESS_DENIED.messagePattern: Logged in user doesn't have access this endpoint: <%= accessErrors %>.

INVALID_CASE_RELATIONSHIP.messagePattern: The case `<%= id %>` needs to be related to another case in order to be able to convert it to a contact

INVALID_EVENT_EVENT_RELATIONSHIP.messagePattern: Related person `<%= id %>` is a event. Cannot create relationships between two events.

INVALID_CONTACT_CONTACT_RELATIONSHIP.messagePattern: Related person `<%= id %>` is a contact. Cannot create relationships between two contacts.

MODEL_NOT_EDITABLE.messagePattern: Model `<%= model %>` id `<%= id %>` is not editable (read-only).

MISSING_REQUIRED_PROPERTY.messagePattern: Model `<%= model %>` is missing required properties: <%= properties %>.

DUPLICATE_TEMPLATE_QUESTION_VARIABLE_OR_.messagePattern: A template cannot contain duplicate question variables and a template question cannot contain duplicate answer value

MODEL_IDENTIFIERS_ARE_NOT_UNIQUE_IN_CONT.messagePattern: The `<%= model %>` is invalid. Details: <%= details %>

DELETE_PARENT_MODEL.messagePattern: This `<%= model %>` still has sub models linked to it. Please make sure to delete all child models before deleting a parent model.

DEACTIVATE_PARENT_MODEL.messagePattern: This `<%= model %>` still has sub models that are active. Please make sure to deactivate all child models before deactivating a parent model.

DUPLICATE_VISUAL_ID.messagePattern: The visual identifier `<%= id %>` is not unique.

INVALID_TRANSLATIONS_FILE.messagePattern: The provided language file `<%= fileName %>` is invalid: <%= details %>

UNSUPPORTED_FILE_TYPE.messagePattern: The provided file `<%= fileName %>` is invalid: <%= details%>

INVALID_GENERATE_FOLLOWUP_PARAMS.messagePattern: Invalid follow up generation parameters. Details: `<%= details %>`

IMPORT_PARTIAL_SUCCESS.messagePattern:
Import Partial Success. Some `<%= model %>` instances failed to be imported. Successfully imported: <%= success %> 
Failed to be imported: <%= failed %>

INVALID_SNAPSHOT_FILE.messagePattern: The provided database snapshot is invalid.

DELETE_CONTACT_LAST_RELATIONSHIP.messagePattern: Cannot delete a contact's last relationship with a case or event. The contact with ID <%= contactIDs %> doesn't have an additional relationship with a case or event.

FILE_ENCRYPTED_OR_ANONIMIZED.messagePattern: Exported file must be either encrypted or anonymized. Please either select some fields to be anynomized or provide a password for encryption

INVALID_IMAGE_TYPE.messagePattern: Provided image type `<%= imageType %>` is invalid.

EXTERNAL_API_CONNECTION_ERROR.messagePattern: Communication with external service (<%= serviceName %>) failed

UNEXPECTED_EXTERNAL_API_RESPONSE.messagePattern: External service (<%= serviceName %>) returned an invalid response
